author: Simon Difford
description: With flavours of rum, coconut, banana and coffee, this tall, frozen drink tastes rather like dessert.
name: Hummingbird
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
30 ml Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)

recipeInstructions.text: BLEND all ingredients with 12oz scoop crushed ice and serve with straws
